alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:01PM CST until February 21 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 91.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CST Saturday was 91.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 92.7 feet tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
